mapper.insert: INSERT into fnq(fq_no, me_no, fq_question, fq_answer , fq_CH) VALUES((SELECT NVL(MAX(fq_no), 0)+1 as fq_no FROM fnq), #{me_no}, #{fq_question}, #{fq_answer}, #{fq_CH})
mapper.select: SELECT fq_no, fq_question, fq_answer FROM fnq where fq_CH = 'H' ORDER BY fq_no ASC
SELECT fq_no, fq_question, fq_answer FROM fnq where fq_CH = 'C' ORDER BY fq_no ASC
